name: 盈盈
粉米
夕岚
莲红
雌霓
唇脂
茹藘
福色
seq01.description_cn: 柔粉与酒红渐变的调色板，呈现浪漫而温柔的氛围，适合表达情感与温暖。适用于化妆品、婚庆设计及女性时尚类产品。
seq01.description_en: A gradient palette of soft pinks and deep reds, evoking a romantic and gentle mood. Ideal for cosmetics, wedding design, and feminine fashion products.

name: 盈盈
水红
桃夭
苏梅
红踯躅
魏红
魏紫
seq02.description_cn: 粉红到紫红的渐变色系，给人娇艳与灵动之感，极具视觉吸引力。适合用于美容行业、浪漫品牌及节日包装。
seq02.description_en: A gradient of pink to purplish red, offering a lively and charming appeal. Perfect for beauty industry, romantic branding, and festive packaging.

name: 退红
昌荣
樱花
紫薄汗
茈藐
紫紶
三公子
油紫
seq03.description_cn: 从浅粉到深紫的优雅过渡，营造神秘且高贵的氛围。适合奢侈品包装、艺术设计及高端室内装饰。
seq03.description_en: An elegant transition from soft pink to deep violet, creating a mysterious and noble ambiance. Suitable for luxury packaging, artistic design, and premium interior decor.

name: 盈盈
退红
杨妃
长春
牙绯
绛纱
茹藘
朱湛
seq04.description_cn: 由粉至深绯的红色序列，体现出东方女性之柔媚与张力。适用于妆容设计、国风服饰及艺术插画。
seq04.description_en: A red sequence from soft pink to deep scarlet, conveying the tenderness and boldness of East Asian femininity. Ideal for makeup, oriental fashion, and illustration.

name: 香炉紫烟
退红
丁香
紫蒲
赪紫
齐紫
凝夜紫
seq05.description_cn: 淡紫至深绀紫的色阶，如香雾缭绕，展现神秘高贵之气。适用于珠宝包装、文艺设计及夜间场景渲染。
seq05.description_en: From light lavender to deep indigo, this palette evokes mystical elegance. Ideal for jewelry packaging, artistic design, and nighttime themes.

name: 黄白游
松花
缃叶
苍黄
流黄
seq06.description_cn: 金黄至古铜的色彩过渡，如初晨阳光洒落。适用于食品包装、农业品牌及文化节庆场景。
seq06.description_en: Golden to bronze hues resemble the glow of morning light. Perfect for food packaging, agricultural branding, and cultural festivities.

name: 黄白游
骍刚

seq07.description_cn: 黄至橙红的火焰色阶，充满热情与能量感。适合用于餐饮、节庆、户外广告等高活力场合。
seq07.description_en: From yellow to fiery reds, this palette exudes warmth and vitality. Ideal for food, festivals, and vibrant outdoor campaigns.

嫩鹅黄

赩炽
石榴裙
丹秫

seq08.description_en: A gradient from yellow to brick red, like sunrise on ancient rooftops. Perfect for traditional foods, handicrafts, and historical video themes.
